text: All Killer, No Filler is the first studio album by Canadian rock band, Sum 41. It was released on May 8, 2001. The producer of the album was Jerry Finn. The album was ranked as the 9th greatest punk pop album of all time by Top40.com. ==Songs== ==References== Category:2001 albums Category:Sum 41 albums Category:Island Records albums
title: All Killer, No Filler
